sentence: We partially wanted a beach holiday and spent a day on the beach being served sangrias and beer by the wonderful Salt staff
We were allowed to check in at 9 am and start our vacation right away
Luckily we managed too book in with the W and it make our holiday for us
Just stayed here for one night for a brief work trip I booked into a basic room and was upgraded to a fabulous room upon check in
Pepe and his staff sent a very nice bottle of fizz and chocolates to our room to help us celebrate the reason for this particular trip our 10th Wedding Anniversary
and we were then introduced to the hotel manager Tatiana who confirmed that she had upgraded the entire group to the Extreme Wow Suite
Stayed as part of honeymoon trip
Staying at the W this past August was the crown jewel of our family trip this summer
We have Been amazed by the Professional and welcoming staff which took our Trip to the next Level

and since the moment i arrived and checked in given my status at the starwod hotel group i had VIP tickets at my door step every day to any party happening at the hotel that day and the security would take us directly to the vip area and that was a sign for how professional they are and how they pamper their guestsalso the food at the pool bar was so good and i had the best bloody mary ever also they get these amazing olives with it that i have never had in my whole life
We slept in until around 11 am as we were on holiday BIG MISTAKE
we are a group of 3 couples arrived at 30am for a 2 nights stay and this is what hapened1
Having stayed at W hotels before the W Barcelona was a definite burden on our holiday
After staying in other W hotels before this holiday was an utter disappointment
The Manager you will see his very defensive replies on Trip Advisor in fact he is known locally around Barca as Defensive Conor is never to be seen
It seems like the whole hotel was made for rich teenagers
Because I enjoyed being with my family I give this hotel a good review however they should grow up to act like a more professional human being
but more suited to singles than families
broken iron which trip the electric circuit when you plug it in

The organization was a real fiasco I never saw something similarAs a group they give us 4 bracelets for one table in W Lounge 2 friends received bracelets for eclipse and one of us for another party how can we fave fun together if the organization is so bad and send us to different parties
and most definitely not suited for families with younger children We were very happy to be upgraded to upper level room but not crazy about the bathroom situation
Again I found this very frustrating and our trip therefore started with a lot of frustration
Went on a business trip to Barcelona Was told by a friend to stay at the W It was only 90 € per nightno breakfast Included at this rate but that is ok I paid for breakfast I did not mind
we had to push for the same floor which is barely acceptable when traveling as a family
I will not recommend your hotel ever nor to my friends or family
We are 3 black females and they automatically assumed we did n’t have the money to pay for our trip so they charged us for the full 6 days plus the security deposit the same minute we checked in
While writing this I ’m also looking at a promotional video for the group which features predominantly white privileged and extremely skinny people
